description: NEW: Search up to 4 sites at once!! This is one of the most useful apps available for webOS! This is too easily and directly search the web's most popular sites that aren't included in the webOS Universal Search. Easily search all of your favorite sites with the touch of a button! Replace all of your other search apps, Bing apps, Dictionary apps, Build a Search app, etc. Web Quick Search does it all!! Must have Pre app lets you quickly search over 60 websites instantly. Swipe down to minimize to dashboard to tuck away for easy access! Search up to 4 sites at once! Quickly search websites such as Dictionary.com, Amazon, IMDB, PreCentral.net, eBay, Thesaurus.com, Bing, Yahoo, Google Images, CNN, Travelzoo, IGN, Flickr, digg, Backcountry.com, RottenTomatoes, and over 45 more (turn on more sites in preferences)! Either select your website of choice or use "Easy Search" quick notation in the form (search term)@(acronym) to find your answer fast, and to search up to 4 sites at once! Once you download Quick Search, you won't be able to live without it. Future updates will include even more features and websites!
